Datatable.LocalizationPair: Minor Factions Multiplier
Multiplier applied to Normal quantity of Minor Civilizations in the Galaxy (Normal is typically 1.5 per player, if using recommended number of players for a given map size)
No minor factions will be generated #FF0000#Will break certain faction quests and render some faction's traits useless#REVERT#
The game will try to generate 50% of the Normal number of minor factions.
1x
The game will try to generate 100% of the Normal number of minor factions.
The game will try to generate 150% of the Normal number of minor factions.
2x
The game will try to generate 200% of the Normal number of minor factions.
The game will try to generate 250% of the Normal number of minor factions.
3x
The game will try to generate 300% of the Normal number of minor factions.
Industry Conversion
Track progress of enemy Hacking Operations passing through this node Blocks Server ID Duplication (Steal Technology) effect if applied to Home System

Blocks Hacking Outcomes of level $(Input). These outcomes include: - Create Backdoor - Embed Sleeper - Influence Politics - Injure Figurehead - Jam Commands Blocks Infiltrate Scanners effect if applied to Home System
+4 [scienceColored] per [relic]
+1 [scienceColored] per [relic] per Fertile
Mercenary Contracting

Having a powerful army is a must if you wish to stand out on the galactic stage, but producing them yourself when you could be erecting large Obelisks is wasteful. By contracting mercenaries instead, this problem is entirely avoided.
Allows Mercenary Attackers to be constructed Mercenaries have higher upkeep, but have improved Privateering
Letters of Marque

A mercenary army is certainly helpful on the front line, but their true power is their "neutrality". Allowing mercenaries to camoflauge themselves as lawless raiders gives you plausible deniability when bombarding an "ally's" shipyards.
Allows Mercenary Hunters to be constructed Mercenaries have higher upkeep, but have improved Privateering
Mercenary Contracting
Enabling this will allow you to research the ability to build minor faction ships.
True
You can research the ability to build minor faction ships.
False
You can not research the ability to build minor faction ships.
Overcolonization Cap
This will determine the baseline number of systems you can have colonized before incurring penalties.
You will have an overcolonization cap of 3
You will have an overcolonization cap of 4
You will have an overcolonization cap of 5
You will have an overcolonization cap of 6 (Recommended)
You will have an overcolonization cap of 7
You will have an overcolonization cap of 8
You will have an overcolonization cap of 9
You will have an overcolonization cap of 10
You will have an overcolonization cap of 11
You will have an overcolonization cap of 12
You will have an overcolonization cap of 13
You will have an overcolonization cap of 14

System Development projects allow you to level up your star systems by using a combination of luxury resource components that generate special bonuses. Note: No fixed turn cost. Costs 25 [industrycolored], 75 [industrycolored] and 125 [industrycolored] per Tier 1, 2 and 3 Luxury, respectively
[Strat01titaniumColored] and [Strat02hyperiumColored] from Rejuvenation Fields, Black Holes and Solar Nebulas
[Strat03adamantianColored] and [Strat04anti-matterColored] from Asteroid Fields and Collapsing Stars
[Strat05orichalcixColored] and [Strat06quadrinixColored] from Neutron Stars and Nebular Clouds
Note: All strategic resource generation effects require having unlocked the resource exploitation.

Enslave factions living on the same planet -5 [happinessColored] per enslaved population +100% [fidsi] from enslaved population
Penance for the Unforgiveable

You see, dear mod user, Chaos has been promising to fix Flotilla Pathing since ESG 1.3. It is now almost ESG 1.5, and yet, there is no Flotilla Pathing rework in sight. Because of this, I will spitefully buff Vodyani by giving them +1% FIDSI per Week he delays from now on. If you wish to play without this, you may make a custom faction and remove this trait.
+1% [fidsi] per [population] on Systems per weeks Chaos has Delayed the Flotilla Pathing Rework
weeks Chaos has Delayed the Flotilla Pathing Rework
